title: Escape from the Red Planet
description: Barin gave up his life as a raider for a noble reason: to save his own ass. Two years later, he has a cushy job, a powerful boyfriend, and... monotony. When his old boss shows up and tries to force him back into a life of crime, should he resist to save his relationships and the person he loves or give in to the pull of excitement? Or, will that choice be made for him?
author: Ricky Wilks
